string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
Alcaster took time observing the ring, and felt an incredible force emanating from it. He recommended that I go see Scadur the Hunter around El Nath.

So this is the #b#t4031053##k that you found at the tomb. It doesn't look like much, but I can feel the force emanate. You didn't find anything else but the ring? Okay... you should look for #bScadur the Hunter#k, who lives around here. He's been hunting exclusively at that valley the last couple of years.
This is a gorgeous ring. It looks a bit old, but I can feel the special force emanate. Hmmm, here, let me see the ring...I have to look really into it.

So this is the #b#t4031053##k that you found at the tomb. It doesn't look like much, but I can feel the force emanate. You didn't find anything else but the ring? Okay... you should look for #bScadur the Hunter#k, who lives around here. He's been hunting exclusively at that valley the last couple of years.

I am concerned about the state of the monsters being much more aggressive than usual these days. There were times where I felt like I was putting my life on the line while hunting. Back in the day I used to bring home a whole lot of Yeti's. As the years go by, the age is definitely starting to show...
